pageProduct.name: Swisse Beauty Bio-Retinol Vitamin B3 10% Renewing Booster Serum 30ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Bio-Retinol 0.5% Vitamin B3 10% Renew Boost Serum is a transformative formula, containing scientifically proven actives that boost & renew the skin. This retexturising serum smooths uneven texture, enhances skin hydration & improves the appearance of dark spots, finelines & wrinkles. Wake up looking refreshed & renewed.

Swisse Bio-Retinol 0.5% Vitamin B3 10% Renew Boost Serum is a transformative formula, containing scientifically proven actives that boost & renew the skin. This retexturising serum smooths uneven texture, enhances skin hydration & improves the appearance of dark spots, finelines & wrinkles. Wake up looking refreshed & renewed.

Size: 30mL

Warnings

Test before use. In the unlikely event of a negative reaction, consult your medical practitioner.

Ingredients

Water, Niacinamide (Vitamin B3), Glycerin (Plant Derived), Propanediol, Pentylene Glycol, Coco-Caprylate, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Bakuchiol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, C13-15 Alkane, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Diheptyl Succinate, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Heptyl Undecylenate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Disodium EDTA, Xanthan Gum, Heptyl Glucoside, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol.

Directions

Directions: For a transformative result, apply every night to face, neck and decolletage after cleansing.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 28°C.
